name: SCRAPNEL
description:
In SCRAPNEL you can build your mech, and use it to battle other mechs. Swap and collect parts of other mechs to find your favorite loadout.  That's right, it's a game about crafting your own body!

Enemies are made of the same parts as you, and can use them all the same way.  Defeating an enemy will blow it up into its separate parts.  Swap your own parts with an enemy's mid-battle to adapt to every situation!
